resources.string: Welcome to Cinemania! This is a game designed to test your film knowldege. Before starting, let us show you the basics.
This is the CineScreen, where a short clip of a film will be played on loop. Your current level is shown below.

This is the Answer section, where you type the title of the film that is being played on the CineScreen or use hints if you dont know the answer. There are some cases where you are required to type in the films year of release after the title.
The game has two kinds of Hints: The Synopsis hint, where a brief plot summary of the film is shown; and The Cast hint, where a list of the principle cast members is shown.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
